title: [1.7.10][搬运]Condensed Block Mod Reborn(凝结成块) v1.0.7
author: shxq
txt_content:
本帖最后由 shxq 于 2015-1-19 10:48 编辑 






捕获.JPG (113.81 KB, 下载次数: 40)

下载附件

2014-10-31 15:45 上传






↓音乐↓
http://static.acfun.mm111.net/player/ACFlashPlayer.out.swf?type=page&url=http://www.acfun.tv/v/ac1509804
此MOD的主要作用就是把许多的物品（西瓜，南瓜，仙人掌，书架，玻璃，活塞等等)凝结成块，使您能更方便得储存。




捕获.JPG (103.05 KB, 下载次数: 36)

下载附件

2014-10-31 16:02 上传






例子:九个西瓜合成一个1级西瓜块，九个1级西瓜块还能合成一个2级西瓜块，九个2级西瓜块还能合成一个3级西瓜块，最多4级能包含 9的4次方=6561个西瓜。




捕获.JPG (96.57 KB, 下载次数: 38)

下载附件

2014-10-31 15:58 上传





更新日志：v1.0.6Added Condensed Glowstone Blocks.
Condensed Bookshelfs now work for enchanting,
Condensed Glowstone now emits light
Condensed Redstone now emits redstone signals
v1.0.5Fixed Condensed stone returning Cobblestone.
Fixed Condensed glass not having a recipe.
Fixed Condensed cobble,sand,dirt Ore Dictionary Recipes(Will now work with Extra Utils Blocks on my side)
v1.0.3Added Condensed Coal/CharcoalAdded Fuel Values to Condensed Coal/CharcoalAdded Config to Enable/Disable each Recipe
v 1.0.1
Added Condensed Block versions of a load of vanilla Items.
Added Recipes for the new blocks.
Added Tool Tips to all blocks for ease of knowing how many base items in stack.
Fixed mcmod.info file not loading.

v 1.0.0
First Public Release(new Blocks coming soon!!)





[groupid=534]Team Trigonometry-F[/groupid]
